meta.article_title: How To Play Fast-Attacking Junior Players

play-fast-attacking-junior-players.diagnostic: The junior is faster and quicker than you.
causes_communes: You spend much of the match on the defensive

debutant: Make steady aggressive shots to start off each rally
Force the fast-swinging junior into erratic shots

exercices_complementaires.description: Particularly effective against juniors who often drill too much crosscourt
Give smaller juniors difficulty as they don't have your reach

metriques_progression: Take control by playing solid shots with few unforced errors
erreurs_a_eviter: Playing too passive and giving the fast-attacking junior easy balls
